document.full_text: carlos beltran became the first player this season to hit three home runs in a major league game, blasting the new york mets to a 9-5 victory over the colorado rockies thursday.
document.title: beltran launches three homers to power mets over
lines_and_colors: carlos beltran became the first player this season to hit three home runs in a major league game, blasting the new york mets to a 9-5 victory over the colorado rockies thursday.
